title: Delirium Syndrome Management in Geriatric Oncology: MOOC-Based Expert Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducted in a blended format, combining MOOC platforms with offline workshops. Learners access online modules via personal devices and engage in case studies and role-playing during weekly face-to-face sessions.

learning_goals: Explain the etiology, diagnostic criteria, and clinical features of delirium syndrome with 80% accuracy
Apply delirium prevention and management strategies for elderly cancer patients to real-world cases
Execute delirium-related decision-making protocols in a multidisciplinary team environment with 90% compliance
Achieve at least 75% mastery on formative assessments of knowledge acquired through online learning modules

resources: Digital Textbook and Research Materials Package

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
